name: Torrent Of Candy
description:
This is a playful Advergame featuring a father who has his candies stolen by his children. The goal ? Collect the candies in the treehouse by climbing from branch to branch. Be careful, you have to be quick so they don't finish the candy

Team 1 Montpellier : Laura Delarbre, Naomi Coulaud, Marine Scotto D'Abbusco et Sarah Pan.
